html:
11.4.18  9:00 am   are you god's gift to this world

     or is the world a gift to you?

11.4.18  8:05 am   in hello sexy pants does the line "At the clothing store, nobody tells you that the whole world is changing. At the grocery store, someone will tell you what changed is you" mean that when you focus on superficial things like clothing and how others think of you, you don't realise that you can't please everyone because everyones opinions always change, but when you focus on what you need, like food, you realise that you are always changing and can only please yourself? or am i just completely off?
11.4.18  7:56 am   hey i have some songs written but im not sure how to get into recording them. Any general tips for taking preformed music and self-producing/recording it?

11.4.18  7:49 am   i saw you respnd to a question asking about what kind of genre of music yours is, and it reminded me of a comment from a while ago on of your songs calling it 'wurtzwave'. whats your opinion on that?
11.4.18  6:56 am   if you were god, would you give the universe and everything in it a purpose and meaning?
11.4.18  6:49 am   how are the non-music parts of being an Online Musician going?
11.4.18  6:29 am   What are your thoughts on the minor third?
11.4.18  6:01 am   Do you think life is complicated?
11.4.18  5:45 am   Music is just paintings in time. Thoughts?

11.4.18  5:35 am   What's your vocal range?

      Do you wish it was wider, or higher, or lower?
11.4.18  4:09 am   what is the optimal loudness for a mix?
11.4.18  3:32 am   Can humans fly?
11.4.18  2:43 am   your mixes need a bit more bass
11.4.18  2:33 am   Did you intentionally reference the hook from I Write Stupid Music in Long Long Long Journey
11.4.18  2:18 am   what's a place you haven't been?
11.4.18  1:17 am   Hey Bill. Would you consider releasing an album with some of you're music in it?
11.4.18  1:14 am   bill how are you coming up with new songs fast?

11.4.18  1:00 am   You mention about the podcast thing popping up completely unconsciously--Have you ever regretted opening up the pathway from your subconscious to your art?

      Is self awareness a blessing or a curse?

11.4.18  1:52 am   did you put swear words in We Could Just Get High? i know it's something you've done in other songs but i can't tell if it's done there. pretty sure i here some sneaky words between some lines
11.4.18  1:51 am   Why do I hate what I make

11.4.18  1:35 am   so you've said that it's taken you roughly two weeks (as of recently) to create new songs.

      what exactly do you do in that two week timeframe from the moment you start composing, to uploading the youtube video?

Thanks Bill!
11.4.18  1:31 am   are you a human or a alien
11.4.18  12:23 am   would you need your future band members to be able to read sheet music
11.3.18  11:41 pm   have you ever had a lucid dream before, if so, what did you experience?
11.3.18  11:26 pm   is life weird for you? it sure seems that way from your content
11.3.18  11:06 pm   What is the most earth-shattering discovery you have ever made?
11.3.18  11:03 pm   i want people to dance to my music as much as they dance to all their favourite radio hits. but how do i make that happen
11.3.18  10:06 pm   in all honesty, what kind of genre is your music

11.3.18  10:05 pm   for some reason i really like the sound of the line 'it's a long long day, and we've come a long long way.' the way it just goes up at the beginning and then ends deeper just sounds really satisfying. is there a name for that in music?
11.3.18  7:34 pm   when are you appearing on the h3 podcast?
11.3.18  7:28 pm   what are your thoughts on immortality?
11.3.18  7:02 pm   Will you ever post more things on the Notebook?
11.3.18  6:52 pm   is dodecahedron one of the basic shapes?my teacher said no - zac

11.3.18  6:41 pm   I am humbly grateful for your uploads every two weeks, even surprising me ahead of schedule; honestly, I wasn't expecting long, long, long, journey until Thursday or Friday. This one has been my morning alarm and have given me wings each time I listen to it.

I think I'm on that "high" that you have been talking about in your older songs and it's a great adventure and I don't want it to stop!!

If you had to give this era of awakening of incredible music a name, what would you give it? The Kiss of Time, A Slice of Life, Electric Euphoria Overload, Mountain of Love or just putting out songs is just enough to be thankful for?
11.3.18  6:34 pm   Do you think you have to sacrifice originality and innovation for speed?
11.3.18  6:09 pm   why does the north pole not show on a map
11.3.18  5:50 pm   how is it, being human?

11.3.18  5:49 pm   In Mount saint Helens is about to blow up you sing "and the people who work in my office went on vacation cous they say i haven't been paying them very much anymore". How can the people who work in you're office afford to go on vacation with so little pay?
11.3.18  4:35 pm   Do you plan to make any songs in a different language?
11.3.18  4:17 pm   How do I find my creative passions ?
11.3.18  3:27 pm   does that podcast line in long long long journey have anything to do with the podcast you're going on?
11.3.18  3:08 pm   What is the long long story in long long long journey

11.3.18  2:47 pm   Do you have any merchandise? I want to give you money. It will give me happiness

hereherethis

11.3.18  2:26 pm   How important are the visual aspects of your work ? I discovered you with one or two videos, but I listen to all of your songs now on Spotify. Do you think my experience of your work is hindered ?
11.3.18  2:25 pm   what font did you use on the hill in "long long long journey"?

11.3.18  2:18 pm   In "Long Long Long Journey", is the main rhythm in the verses ("down to the coast guard to see what they're") comprised of triplet groups or groups of two dotted eighth notes and an eighth note?
11.3.18  2:05 pm   Josh Turner here, I did the "And the day goes on" cover. If i may be so bold - want to grab a beer some time?

11.3.18  1:09 pm   Christmas falls on a Tuesday this year..  do you think that your song release for that day will be a christmas song, or will you just sprinkle some christmassy images into the video?
11.3.18  12:48 pm   i can't figure out how to eat. can you give me some help please?
11.3.18  12:26 pm   How do you make transitioning into odd time signatures sound natural (like in "I'm Best Friends with my own Front Door when you go to 7/4)?
